summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 5763 for the improvement of 38th Avenue Southwest, from West Edmunds Street to West Hudson Street; by constructing watermains and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 75982 as amended by Ordinance No. 76155, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
